author: chirino
msg: Better DB2 support.  Thanks goes to Klaus Terjung on activemq-users list for providing the needed info.

author: trawick
msg: mod_ldap: Brad's pool fixes to fix a race condition during
first request as well as thread-safety issues between threads
handling different vhosts at steady state

author: aroush
msg: Fixed up project description and details.

author: cutting
msg: Stop using ssh options by default that are not yet in widely used versions of ssh.  Folks can still enable their use by uncommenting a line in conf/hadoop-env.sh.
